mapper.select: select count(1) as cnt from ${msg_table} where STATUS = '1' and (RESERVED_DATE = '00000000000000' OR RESERVED_DATE <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) and REQUEST_DATE is null and ETC5 is null
mapper.update: update ${msg_table} set ETC5 = '${group_no}' where STATUS = '1' and (RESERVED_DATE = '00000000000000' OR RESERVED_DATE <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) and REQUEST_DATE is null and ETC5 is null and ROWNUM <= 1000
mapper.select: select 'K' || ID as msg_id, 'AT' as message_type, MESSAGE as msg_txt, RESEND_MT_MESSAGE as sms_txt, PHONE_NUMBER as call_to, RESEND_MT_FROM as call_from, (case when RESEND_MT_TYPE = 'NO' then null when RESEND_MT_TYPE = 'LM' then 'L' when RESEND_MT_TYPE = 'SM' then (case when LENGTHB(CONVERT(RESEND_MT_MESSAGE, 'KO16MSWIN949')) > 90 THEN 'L' else 'S' end) end) as smskind, TITLE as msg_txt_title, 'D' as pcom, 'N' as crypto, ATTACHMENT_JSON as button, BILL_CODE as bill_code, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS curr_date, TEMPLATE_CODE as template_cd, (case when SENDER_KEY = 'c5f8f78627fe0877758d4b339fa09252b68c5cc1' then 'e928cfe1258ede6069fde1b680aa24a25e38e148' else SENDER_KEY end) as profile_key, NVL(RESERVED_DATE, '00000000000000') AS snd_dttm from ${msg_table} where STATUS = '1' and ETC5 = '${group_no}'
mapper.update: update ${msg_table} set STATUS = '2', RESPONSE_CODE = '${rescode}', REQUEST_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), RESPONSE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') where STATUS = '1' and ETC5 = '${group_no}'
update ${msg_table} set STATUS = '1', ETC5 = null, REQUEST_DATE = null where ETC5 = '${group_no}'

update ${msg_table} set STATUS = '${status}', REPORT_TYPE = '${restype}', REPORT_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), REPORT_CODE = '${kao_err_code}', ARRIVAL_DATE = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('${kao_send_date}','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), RESEND_REPORT_CODE = '${msg_err_code}', RESEND_ARRIVAL_DATE = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('${msg_send_date}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') where ID = '${msgid}'
mapper.insert: insert into ${log_table} select * from ${msg_table} where ID = '${msgid}'
